title: Authme连接MYSQL时警告
author: 超级粒子炮
txt_content:
这个提示几乎没有影响，但是他老是报这个错误啊。。我觉得得解决一下。
[11:00:11 WARN]: [Craft Scheduler Thread - 2183] WARN fr.xephi.authme.libs.com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.PoolBase - AuthMeMYSQLPool - Failed to validate connection com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection@7adf2145 (No operations allowed after connection closed.). Possibly consider using a shorter maxLifetime value.
[11:00:11 INFO]: xiaoyangcreate >>>有书吗，谁能借我点
